content.rendered:
Directed by Varun Khanna.

Written by Vijay Basu.

Cast Mohamed Abdullah((as Abdul Khaan)).Naina Aswal. Ram Bhadoria(Eve Teaser). Himesh Choudhary(Eveteaser).Rajkumar Kanojia.Ehsan Khan.Emran Khan.Oviya.Deepraj Rana.Ayushi Rao.Mukesh Tiwari.Akhilesh Verma

Languages Hindi. Tamil.

Producers Mohamed Abdullah. Dharmbir Gurjar. Bablu Tiwari. Dhaniram Tocus. Sushila Tocus.

Production AK Film Productions. Rahul Productions.
